tool_description: HAPI Books is an API about books. It gives information about thousands of books from all around the world. Search by name, by genre, get the best books by year, and more!
name: HAPI Books
title: HAPI Books

api_list.name: Get the Most Popular Authors
api_list.description: Get the list of the most popular authors right now with a set of other relevant information.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/top_authors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/top_authors"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Book Information by Book Id
api_list.description: Giving its Id, this endpoint returns a lot of information about that book, such as Name, Published Date, Authors, Synopsis, and many more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/book/56597885"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/book/{book_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Weekly Popular Books by Genre
api_list.description: Returns the most popular books from the last weeks given a genre.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/week/horror/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/week/{genre}/{number_results}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Books by Name
api_list.description:
Giving a book name (where spaces must be replaced by '+') you will receive a list of corresponding books. This list can return up to 20 books related to the input.
Each book has information such as Name, Authors, Cover image URL, Launched Year, and many more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/search/the+walking+dead"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/search/{book_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the Awarded Books of a Year
api_list.description:
Returns the list of the best books of a year by its winning category.
Each returned book has its Name, Winning Category, Cover Image and more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/top/2021"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/top/{year}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List of Nominated Books for a Genre in a Year
api_list.description: For a certain year and a genre, get the list of all nominated books to win an award.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/nominees/romance/2020"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Author Information by Id
api_list.description: Get a large variety of information of an Author such as the name, a brief biography, the list of books, and more.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the Top 15 most popular books in a Month of an Year
api_list.description: Provide the year and the month (between 1 and 12) and receive the 15 most popular books for that month.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/month/2022/3"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com/month/{year}/{month}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hapi-books.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
